Name: Little machines world
About the game: A game in the genre of arcade role-playing racing. The goal of the game is to get into the top three. A choice of 10 cars with different characteristics. There are two game modes: 1 - Championship (8 cars participate) 2 - Arcade (8 to 30 cars participate) You can also play with friends on one screen, in any mode.
